attribute.joyg.mana_on_hit_chance.desc: Chance to gain Instant Mana when you land a melee hit
death.attack.bleeding.player: %1$s bled to death whilst trying to escape %2$s
attribute.joyg.skill_cdr.desc: Reduces the Cooldown of your Martial Skills with diminishing returns
attribute.joyg.skill_effect_area.desc: Multiplies the Area of your Martial Skills by this amount
attribute.joyg.mana_gained_on_hit.desc: Increases mana gained by 5% of max mana, when Instant Mana on hit procs
attribute.joyg.maim.desc: Chance to Maim on hit, slowing enemies. Direct damage will inflict a stronger maim while Indirect hits will instead last longer
death.attack.bleeding.item: %1$s was bled to death by %2$s using %3$s
attribute.joyg.envenom.desc: Chance on crit towards poisoned enemies to add 1 stack of poison and increase duration by 1 second
